text: Can't believe the 49ers pulled off that comeback! Their defense in the second half was incredible.

replies.text: Absolutely, Marcus! That interception in the 4th quarter was a game-changer. Kudos to the 49ers' coaching staff for those adjustments.

text: The Chiefs' offense was on fire in the first half though. Mahomes to Hill for that 75-yard touchdown was a thing of beauty.

replies.text: True, Elena. That connection is always lethal. But the 49ers' defense stepped up when it mattered most. Super Bowl games like this are why I love football.
Agreed on all points. Both teams played their hearts out. This will go down as one of the most memorable Super Bowls for sure.

text: Anyone else think the MVP award should have gone to the 49ers' linebacker? His performance tonight was outstanding.

replies.text: Definitely, Samuel. His tackles and that critical sack in the 3rd quarter were pivotal. Totally deserved MVP in my book.
